title: Integrated Social Studies Civic Education Design for Second Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary-level social studies concepts and intermediate second-language communication skills
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service teachers featuring tasks that include case analyses of learners from diverse cultural backgrounds to simulate real classroom environments.

learning_goals: Learners can develop lesson plans that improve second-language learners' understanding of civic education content by 80% or more.
Learners can create three or more social studies project assignments that integrate literacy-enhancing strategies.
Learners can develop instructional materials using the four-domain model (literacy skills, discipline-specific literacy, prior knowledge, content knowledge).

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Notion)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
